charset.description: Defines the character encoding for the document.

description.description: Page description to help search engines generate summaries.
description.detail: Example: <meta name="description" content="This is a sample page demonstrating the use of meta tags.">

keywords.description: Keywords related to the page content for search engine optimization (SEO).
keywords.detail: Example: <meta name="keywords" content="sample, meta tags, HTML, SEO">

X-UA-Compatible.description: Specifies the latest rendering mode for IE browser.

theme-color.description: Sets the theme color, some browsers use this for the title bar color.

og:type.description: Defines the page type as a website, Open Graph protocol.

og:title.description: Defines the page title, Open Graph protocol.

og:description.description: Defines the page description, Open Graph protocol.
og:description.detail: Example: <meta property="og:description" content="This is a sample page demonstrating the use of meta tags.">

og:url.description: Defines the page URL, Open Graph protocol.

og:image.description: Defines the image to display when sharing, Open Graph protocol.

twitter:card.description: Defines the type of Twitter card as a large image summary.

twitter:title.description: Defines the title of the Twitter card.

twitter:description.description: Defines the description of the Twitter card.
twitter:description.detail: Example: <meta name="twitter:description" content="This is a sample page demonstrating the use of meta tags.">

twitter:image.description: Defines the image of the Twitter card.

refresh.description: Sets the page to redirect to a specified URL after a specified time.

expires.description: Sets the expiration date and time of the page.

referrer.description: Sets the Referrer policy to not send referrer information.

apple-mobile-web-app-status-bar-style.description: Sets the status bar style on Apple devices.

robots.description: Sets the rules for search engine crawling, allowing indexing and following links on the page.
